All right,

maybe a tablespoon or so.

yeah maybe a half a teaspoon.

use an off the shelf rub, whatever.
Or use this rub, it works good!
All right, like I said,

here I've got about a five
and a half pound chicken here

and I've got one of those beer
can chicken holders, right?

it works with steadyin'

You get one of those.

Now with the paprika, the

it's gonna give it a lotta color.

And it's gonna take a couple
full chimneys of charcoal,
pre-lit charcoal,

So simple enough.

And we are also not gonna
use that top grate as well

so we're gonna put it
down inside this grill

Now, here's the bacon, right?

over the chicken,

and this will help baste

And this bird is gonna take
a couple hours to cook, all right?
So this bacon will be a natural basting.
As well as that beer on the inside, right?

Man!

All right, the bacon has
